title: My Pixel2 BT headset button will accept and end calls but won't start/stop audio
content:
I have a Pixel 2 and it's been great. It's work easily with all my various Bluetooth earbud options. I recently got a Jabra 75 headset for work calls. The main action button on the Jabra headset will accept and end calls just fine. Unfortunately, it won't begin audio playback (start/stop podcast, etc). I have tried unpairing, repairing, asking Jabra tech support, and various other workarounds but haven't succeeded. 

Any ideas?

Thanks in advance!
